What is Earth Science Education?

Earth Science is the science that deals with geology, chemistry, some physics, and the composition of the earth and the evolution of creature on the earth. With earth science education, one would teach these subjects to a variety of levels of education.

 

Why should I consider majoring in Earth Science Education?

You might like this major if you like to help and work with others, solve problems, have an interest in evolution, composition of the earth, plate tectonics, geological time, etc.

 

What will I learn from studying Earth Science Education?

How to teach others in Earth Science at different education levels, and the subjects related to it.
